title: Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala : Awards | Carnegie Corporation of New York

quotes: Prior to her time in Nigeria, she had a 25-year career at the World Bank, ultimately serving as the managing director of operations from 2007 to 2011, before returning in 2021 as director-general.

quotes: She also spearheaded the write-off by the Paris Club of $30 billion of the country’s debt.
